Language.Sentence: The Form dropdown list type produces an object displayed as a drop-down list. It can be contained only in the Form and Container objects. The data to display must be written in the 'Value' attribute separated by logical slashes (|) and the same number of identifiers of these values must be written in the 'Value ID' attribute separated by logical slashes (|).
Order of rendering the object on the page
Position in visual hierarchy of objects
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels
Width of the object in pixels
Height of the object in pixels
String of displayed values, separated by '|'
String of identifying values, separated by '|'
Index of selected value in list (from 0)
Index number of switching the elements on pressing the tab key
Define the selection mode, that is the number of selected values
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1

Set 'selected' to item from the list

Define if new item is selected or not
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
X-coordinate of the new position relative to the left upper corner of the container
Y-coordinate of the new position relative to the left upper corner of the container
Visual effect of moving, time is indicated in milliseconds
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds

Type.SourceCode:
import StringIO
class VDOM_formdropdown(VDOM_object):
def render(self, contents=""): display = u"display:none;" if self.visible == "0" else u""
style = u"""position: absolute; z-index: {zind}; top: {top}px; left: {left}px; width: {width}px; height: {height}px; {display} font: 14px tahoma """.format(zind = self.zindex, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width, height = self.height, display = display)
id = u"o_" + (self.id).replace('-', '_') size_attr = u"""size="%s" """ % self.size if self.size else u""
classname = u"""class="%s" """ % self.classname if self.classname else u""
if self.multiselect and self.multiselect == "1": multiselect_attr = u"""multiselect="1" """ else: multiselect_attr = u""
select = u"""<select id="{id}" name="{name}" tabindex="{tabind}" {size} {multisel} style="{style}" {classname}> """.format(id = id, name = self.name, tabind = self.tabindex, size = size_attr, multisel = multiselect_attr, style = style, classname = classname)
if not self.value: self.value = self.value1
list = self.value.split("|") list1 = self.value1.split("|") if len(list) != len(list1): return u""
res_buffer = StringIO.StringIO(u"") res_buffer.write(select)
for idx in xrange(len(list1)): if unicode(list1[idx]) == unicode(self.selectedvalue): selected = u"""selected="selected" """ else: selected = u"" option = u"""<option value="{cur_value}" {selected}>{cur_item}</option>"""\ .format(cur_value = list1[idx], selected = selected, cur_item = list[idx]) res_buffer.write(option)
res_buffer.write(u"</select>") result = res_buffer.getvalue() res_buffer.close() return result
def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""):
result = \ u"""<container id="{id}" visible="{vis}" zindex="{zind}" hierarchy="{hierarchy}" order="{order}" top="{top}" left="{left}" width="{width}" height="{height}"> <svg> <rect y="{out_top}" x="{out_left}" width="{out_wid}" height="{out_hei}" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#000000"/> </svg>{contents} <svg> <rect x="{inn_left}" y="{inn_top}" width="{inn_wid}" height="{inn_hei}" fill="#EEEEEE" stroke="#000000"/> <polygon fill="black" stroke="#000000" points="{xa},{ya} {xb},{yb} {xc},{yc}"/> </svg> </container> """.format(id = self.id, vis = self.visible, zind = self.zindex, hierarchy = self.hierarchy, order = self.order, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width, height = self.height, out_top = 0, out_left = 0, out_wid = int(self.width)-1, out_hei = int(self.height)-1, contents = contents, inn_left = int(self.width)-14, inn_top = 0, inn_wid = 14, inn_hei = int(self.height)-1, xa = int(self.width)-9, ya = int(self.height) / 2 - 3, xb = int(self.width)-5, yb = int(self.height) / 2 - 3, xc = int(self.width)-7, yc = int(self.height) / 2 + 3)
return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=result)
